add structure to a nomination, it is recommended to follow STAR approach for achievement description: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"S.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – situation – recall the situation revealing this competency (for example - domain knowledge acquisition: recall the situation, when domain knowledge acquisition was a task of high priority/key task of the project stage/ etc.) 3-4 sentences for situation overview. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"T.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – task/trouble – specify why this situation was so remarkable/uncommon. 1-2 sentences \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– actions – what were the actions taken by you and the other people involved? How much time did it take to complete these actions/achieve the result?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"R. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– result – what result, successes, and accomplishments were (not) achieved? Roadblocks – where there any challenges/obstacles to overcome? What had been changed in the company/project thereafter? What business goal was achieved as a result of this accomplishment? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For example:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"S.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"situation - There was a time consuming and error-prone manual process used by customers for a long time. In short, editors created documents with specific characteristics and published them to be available on Practical Law site. There are also pages that contain documents grouped by area/topic and jurisdiction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"T. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– task/challenge - These pages had to be populated manually with links to country-specific documents grouped by topic. WCMS containers were used for this. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"action - Senior Software Engineer, by his own initiative, studied the capabilities of WCMS and found out that it is possible to have auto populated containers. He tried having a few populated containers and presented the idea to customers. They were happy to get this work automated. Later they asked him for a few improvements, like changing the order of links or number of links to be shown, and having a bit different logic when choosing what to show. He attentively investigated all the requests. Sometimes this involved talking to the architect and other teams and asking them to do some work. He involved his colleagues into the investigation, which made it efficient.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"R.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – results - In the end, he had the containers set up in the way customers wanted them to be set up. They shared their thanks several times after this had been automated. It made the life easier of two different groups of people: the team, who usually either make the initial setup or support the containers and editors, who now do not depend on the containers setup process and can see the result immediately after they have the documents published. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Stages:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of April (April is used just as an example) the notification e-mail will be sent with a reminder to collect previous month's nominations. After the list of nominates is ready, the Steering Committee will select nominations corresponding 'On Spot Bonus' criteria. Later on, these bonuses will be added to the May payroll and responsible manager (RM/DM/PM/PC) will communicate this fact to each nominated employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9805,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c6245d9-2953-4b04-a641-66fc23d5712d/stages.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c6245d9-2953-4b04-a641-66fc23d5712d/stages.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"stages.PNG\",\"name\":\"stages.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8c6245d9-2953-4b04-a641-66fc23d5712d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":729,\"height\":181},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Collect an employee is nominated for his April achievement he will get his bonus added to May payroll which is actually paid in June;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Responsible manager (RM/DM/PM/PC) communicates
